title: The Basement Massacre | American Horror Stories - Episode 1: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part One" (HD Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: Tonight you belong to me never fails to give me goosebumps on this show
This is most definitely one of my favorite murder house death scenes by far, I’m so glad they went back. And Paris was phenomenal as Maya.
I like how fast this scene moved and the camera actually followed each victim as they got slashed.
I was so happy when they put the song from the first AHS in the pilot, into this spin off. Definitely what a great start can’t wait to see more.
Michael would have been so proud of Paris.❤️
description:
Rubber Woman (Sierra McCormick) murders Maya (Paris Jackson) and her friends - with a brief glimpse of The Infantata!

American Horror Stories, the official American Horror Story spin-off series, is property of 20th Television, FX Networks, & Hulu - stream it now, exclusively on FX on Hulu.
